mapper.select: SELECT A.SERV_ID, A.ZIPCODE, A.ADDRESS, A.ADDRESS_DETAIL, A.PARTICIPANT, A.AGE_MIN, A.AGE_MAX, A.PER_MEN, A.SERV_TYPE_CODE, A.EVENT_TYPE_CODE, A.DESSERT_YN, A.PER_BUD, A.SERV_DATE, A.APP_DATE, A.INTERIOR_YN, A.COOKING_YN, A.DISCHARGE_YN, A.ELEVATOR_YN, A.PARKING_YN, A.TABLEWARE_YN, A.COORDINATOR_YN, A.OTHER_ORDER_YN, A.REQUESTED_TERM, A.PROGRESS_CODE FROM CRD_SERV_APP A INNER JOIN CRD_SERV_SUGG S ON A.SERV_ID = S.SERV_ID AND S.CHOOSE_YN='N' AND A.PROGRESS_CODE='aa00000000'

SELECT A.SERV_ID, A.ZIPCODE, A.ADDRESS, A.ADDRESS_DETAIL, A.PARTICIPANT, A.AGE_MIN, A.AGE_MAX, A.PER_MEN, A.SERV_TYPE_CODE, A.EVENT_TYPE_CODE, A.DESSERT_YN, A.PER_BUD, A.SERV_DATE, A.APP_DATE, A.INTERIOR_YN, A.COOKING_YN, A.DISCHARGE_YN, A.ELEVATOR_YN, A.PARKING_YN, A.TABLEWARE_YN, A.COORDINATOR_YN, A.OTHER_ORDER_YN, A.REQUESTED_TERM, A.PROGRESS_CODE FROM CRD_SERV_APP A INNER JOIN CRD_SERV_SUGG S ON A.SERV_ID = S.SERV_ID AND S.CHOOSE_YN='Y' AND A.PROGRESS_CODE='aa11111111'
